snippet.title: Astrea: Six-Sided Oracles - Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Astrea: Six-Sided Oracles is coming to Xbox soon!

Astrea is a DICE-deck-building roguelike that flips the script on deckbuilders by using dice instead of cards and an unique dual “damage” system: Purification vs Corruption. Build a dice pool strong enough to purify Astrea's out-of-control corruption and save the Star System.

To learn more about Akupara Games and Astrea: Six-Sided Oracles visit:
►Akupara Games: https://linktr.ee/akuparagames
►Astrea: Six-Sided Oracles: https://www.akuparagames.com/game/astrea-six-sided-oracles/"\
#idxbox #idatxbox #id_xbox
